channel.title: Skip opening confirmation
channel.description:
Greetings, I use an RSS reader and want to open links (LOTS of links) directly in the browser, but on all requests it requires individual confirmation. That the focus is lost and by default "no" is checked makes it even more tedious.
Is there any way to skip the requests, add a whitelist of apps, or just allow future requests for an app after the first confirmation?
